CEO, Liberata

Dermot has 20 years of industrial experience with a strong track record of successfully growing businesses in the Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) market. He joined Liberata in 2009 from Serco Group Plcâ€™s Civil Government Division where he was Chief Operating Officer. Previously, he was Executive Director of the Commercial Services Division at Capita Plc, which included both private and public sector BPO operations.

He holds a BBS Honours degree in Business Studies from the University of Limerick and an MBA from University College Dublin. He also has an MSc in International Accounting and Finance from London School of Economics.
